pt.ipleiria.sas.mobile.cantinaipl.controller

Class ImagesManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ipleiria.sas.mobile.cantinaipl.controller.ImagesManager

  • public class ImagesManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to manage the images. This class is used by the BaseAdapters of the lists, to manage the image downloads to a cache directory.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    2013.0430
    Author:
    Márcio Francisco and Mário Correia
